items.name: enum XCUIElement.ElementType
items.desc: The types of UI element that you find, inspect, and interact with in a UI test.

items.name: var value: Any?
items.desc: The raw value attribute of the element.

items.name: var placeholderValue: String?
items.desc: The value that is displayed when the element has no value.

items.name: var title: String
items.desc: The title attribute of the element.

items.name: var label: String
items.desc: The label attribute of the element.

items.name: var hasFocus: Bool
items.desc: Whether or not the element has UI focus.

items.name: var isEnabled: Bool
items.desc: Whether or not the element is enabled for user interaction.

items.name: var isSelected: Bool
items.desc: Whether or not the element is selected.

items.name: var frame: CGRect
items.desc: The frame of the element in the screen coordinate space.

items.name: var horizontalSizeClass: XCUIElement.SizeClass
items.desc: The horizontal size class of the element.

items.name: var verticalSizeClass: XCUIElement.SizeClass
items.desc: The vertical size class of the element.

items.name: enum XCUIElement.SizeClass
items.desc: The user interface size classes you can inspect in a UI test.
